press_button.description: Press the button to start the coffee machine.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to set the desired settings on the coffee machine.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to maintain hygiene and longevity.

rotate_portafilter.description: Rotate the portafilter to attach or detach it from the coffee machine.

clean_portafilter.description: Clean the portafilter to ensure high-quality coffee and prevent buildup.

clean_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine, including the body, button, knob, and portafilter.

set_up_coffee_machine.description: Set up the coffee machine by pressing the button and rotating the knob to desired settings.
